description: Returns a list of the agreements for the server that's identified by the ServerId that you supply. If you want to limit the results to a certain number, supply a value for the MaxResults parameter. If you ran the command previously and received a value for NextToken, you can supply that value to continue listing agreements from where you left off.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the server for which you want a list of agreements.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Returns a token that you can use to call ListAgreements again and receive additional results, if there are any.

nested_items.name: Agreements
nested_items.description: Returns an array, where each item contains the details of an agreement.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified agreement.

nested_items.name: AgreementId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the agreement. This identifier is returned when you create an agreement.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The current description for the agreement. You can change it by calling the UpdateAgreement operation and providing a new description.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The agreement can be either ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the agreement.

nested_items.name: LocalProfileId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the AS2 local profile.

nested_items.name: PartnerProfileId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.
